name: devfolio
description: using hono framework, deploying at cloudflare workers
author: Takaya Maekawa

scripts.submodule: git submodule init && git submodule update --recursive --remote
scripts.build-blog: npm run submodule && cd ./blog/ && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && ./create_blog_dir.sh
scripts.build-blog-win: npm run submodule && cd ./blog/ && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && .\create_blog_dir.sh
scripts.deploy-blog: npm run build && npm run build-blog && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy-blog-win: npm run build && npm run build-blog-win && wrangler deploy
